page.title: 12WILLIAM HARVEY HOSPITAL 2
page.content: There are 2 different courses that nurses can follow. 1 requires a minimum of 6 Â£O'Levels and the nurses who follow this course are known as students, These girls end up as R.G.N (Registered, General, Nurses). These nurses can go on to sisters etc. The other course requires 2 Â£O'Levels and the girls on this course are known as pupils.They end up as E.N.G.(Enrolled, Nurses,General).Each different type of staff has a different uniform. R.G.N. nurses wear-thick green belts, green band around white cap + white tunic, E.N.G. nurses wear-blue belts, blue band around white cap + white tunic, Pupils\Students wear-white belts,white band around white cap + white tunic. Sisters wear- dark blue tunic Nursing offices wear- medium blue tunics.
